body_html:
It looks like NVIDIA reported that gcc 6.4 is not supported with cuda 9.1:
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/

Could you try upgrading cuda and gcc?
body_text:
It looks like NVIDIA reported that gcc 6.4 is not supported with cuda 9.1:
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/
Could you try upgrading cuda and gcc?
body:
It looks like NVIDIA reported that gcc 6.4 is not supported with cuda 9.1:
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/

Could you try upgrading cuda and gcc?
